lead_paragraph: If Alabama Coach Nick Saban stays at the university for another nine years, it will be worth $5 million to him. The university system’s Board of Trustees compensation committee unanimously approved a three-year extension through Jan. 31, 2018.
snippet: If Alabama Coach Nick Saban stays at the university for another nine years, it will be worth $5 million to him. The university system’s Board of Trustees compensation committee unanimously approved a three-year extension through Jan. 31, 2018.
